column4: i've been trying to get my ipod (windows formatted 4rth gen w/ USB 2.0) to work. I was able to detect/add an album using gtkpod. My only problem was successfully unmounting it (w/o "Do Not Disconnect.." message). I used 'sudo eject /dev/sda', which finally worked. Everything looks okay, except that my podcasts are gone:/ Any advice so this won't happen again?
I'm guessing itunes creates that podcast listing, what I do is make sure all my podcasts are filed as "podcast" in the genre field
those are usually source packages, which are usually not good for beginners
